sentences.sentence: I can't even eat a baby conch!
sentences.translation: 我连一个婴儿海螺都吃不了！

sentences.sentence: When she returned with the conch, they were waiting and watching.
sentences.translation: 当她拿着海螺回来时，他们都在等着看。

sentences.sentence: Monks in orange robes offer flowers and food to the gods and produce haunting sounds on conch shells.
sentences.translation: 身穿橘袍的僧人向神灵献上鲜花和食物，并在海螺壳上发出萦绕不去的声音。
